summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the BridgeTower multimodal model's configuration, initialization, loading from pretrained weights, saving, parallelism, offloading strategies, and core functionalities such as image‑text retrieval, masked language modeling, handling of hidden states, gradient retention, and embedding inputs.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, robustness, and deployability of the BridgeTower model across various environments and use‑cases, supporting reliable integration into production systems.
